title: King Arthur: Round Table Rhapsody - Novel Updates

description:
Yi Fan, who'd been ordered to go on England on a mission, accidentally crossed over to the world of Camelot as Merlin, the teacher of King Arthur the Legend.

But he was stuck in a predicament without memory, without knowledge of magic, nothing!>
